text: 👍🏼💡👨‍⚕️👩‍⚕️PGIMER Specialists backing preventive health care! 🙌🏼💖Now, they'll engage with the public on preventive healthcare, an extension of their community outreach programs since 2023! 🎉🌟Doctors from different departments will be sent to adopted centers each month for direct community interaction! 🤝🏼👨‍💻Prof Vivek Lal emphasizes the importance of this educational outreach, aiming to improve health outcomes, reduce financial strain on patients & institute's resources! 💡👍🏼The department of nephrology will be the first to send doctors! 👨‍⚕️👩‍⚕️A monthly roster will be prepared, and awareness talks will be held for patients to feel at ease while interacting with them! 😊👍🏼Kudos, PGIMER! 👏🏼🌟Let's work together for better healthcare! 💕🤝🏼
